metadata.title: CVE-2019-6342 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description: An access bypass vulnerability exists when the experimental Workspacesmodule in Drupal 8 core is enabled. This can be mitigated by disabling theWorkspaces module. It does not affect any release other than Drupal 8.7.4.

criterions.comment: drupal7 package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
